text: Ara ami bani-isara'iladigake dana karechi uttama sthana ebam taderake aharya diyechi pabitra-paricchanna bastu-samagri. Bastutah tadera madhye matabirodha hayani yataksana na tadera kache ese paucheche sambada. Nihsandehe tomara para'oyaradegara tadera majhe mimansa kare debena keyamatera dina; ye byapare tadera majhe matabirodha hayechila
